General.Name: Chengdu Spaceon Electronics Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Chengdu Spaceon Electronics Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, production, and sale of time frequency solutions and satellite applications in China and internationally. The company offers atomic clocks, crystal devices, frequency components and equipment, time synchronization systems, etc., as well as Bei Dou satellite applications. It provides its products for use in space, satellite navigation, military and defence, and telecommunication fields. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Chengdu, China.
General.Address: Building 2, Guobin Headquarters Base, Chengdu, China, 610037
